name: Nature's Canvas
description:
Note:
Press P or ESC to open pause menu.
G to generate random board

A relaxing building game I made in Unity. Using procedurally generated land, players can design and decorate their own world with trees, huts, and more. This project proved to be a great exercise in pushing my Unity skills further.

PS: Apparently, some browsers don't support Unity's new  input system. (At least it works on Edge and Chrome...)

Background Music

Music by Oleksii Kaplunskyi from Pixabay
